gitstats 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    A GraphQLQueryGitHub class

    GraphQLQueryGitHub.Rd

    A class with methods to build GraphQL Queries for GitHub.

    Super class

    gitstats::GraphQLQuery -> GraphQLQueryGitHub

    Methods

    Public methods

    • GraphQLQueryGitHub$repos_by_org()

    • GraphQLQueryGitHub$users_id()

    • GraphQLQueryGitHub$commits_by_repo()

    • GraphQLQueryGitHub$clone()

    Inherited methods

      Method repos_by_org()

      Prepare query to get repositories from GitHub.

      Usage

      GraphQLQueryGitHub$repos_by_org(org, cursor)

      Arguments

      org

      An organization of repositories.

      cursor

      An end cursor for repositories page.

      Returns

      A query.

      Method users_id()

      Prepare query to get ID of a GitHub user.

      Usage

      GraphQLQueryGitHub$users_id(login)

      Arguments

      login

      A login of a user.

      Returns

      A query.

      Method commits_by_repo()

      Prepare query to get commits on GitHub.

      Usage

      GraphQLQueryGitHub$commits_by_repo(
  org,
  repo,
  since,
  until,
  commits_cursor = "",
  author_id = ""
)

      Arguments

      org

      A GitHub organization.

      repo

      Name of a repository.

      since

      Git Time Stamp of starting date of commits.

      until

      Git Time STamp of end date of commits.

      commits_cursor

      An endCursor.

      author_id

      An Id of an author.

      Returns

      A query.

      Method clone()

      The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

      Usage

      GraphQLQueryGitHub$clone(deep = FALSE)

      Arguments

      deep

      Whether to make a deep clone.
